name: Al-Fatihah
mainTheme: Introduction to Allah's mercy and guidance.

name: Al-Baqarah
mainTheme: Guidance on faith, law, and spirituality for the Muslim community.

name: Ali 'Imran
mainTheme: The steadfastness of believers and the history of past nations.

name: An-Nisa
mainTheme: Rights and responsibilities of women, social justice, and family laws.

name: Al-Ma'idah
mainTheme: Laws regarding dietary restrictions, oaths, and interactions with other communities.

name: Al-An'am
mainTheme: Monotheism, rejecting idol worship, and lessons from nature.

name: Al-A'raf
mainTheme: Stories of prophets and the consequences of accepting or rejecting divine guidance.

name: Al-Anfal
mainTheme: Guidelines on war, peace, and distribution of spoils.

name: At-Tawbah
mainTheme: Repentance, divine mercy, and warnings to hypocrites.

name: Yunus
mainTheme: The story of Prophet Yunus and the patience required in faith.

name: Hud
mainTheme: Stories of past nations and the consequences of rejecting prophets.

name: Yusuf
mainTheme: The story of Prophet Yusuf as an example of patience, trust, and forgiveness.

name: Ar-Ra'd
mainTheme: The signs of Allah in nature and the consequences of disbelief.

name: Ibrahim
mainTheme: The prayer of Prophet Ibrahim and the reminder of accountability.

name: Al-Hijr
mainTheme: Divine protection of the Quran and the rejection of past nations.

name: An-Nahl
mainTheme: The blessings of Allah and the importance of gratitude.

name: Al-Isra
mainTheme: The night journey of Prophet Muhammad and moral teachings.

name: Al-Kahf
mainTheme: The story of the people of the cave and lessons in faith.

name: Maryam
mainTheme: The story of Maryam and the birth of Prophet Isa (Jesus).

name: Ta-Ha
mainTheme: The story of Prophet Musa (Moses) and divine guidance.

name: Al-Anbiya
mainTheme: The stories of many prophets and their missions.

name: Al-Hajj
mainTheme: The significance of Hajj (pilgrimage) and unity in worship.

name: Al-Mu’minun
mainTheme: The qualities of true believers and their rewards.

name: An-Nur
mainTheme: Social laws, morality, and the metaphor of light.

name: Al-Furqan
mainTheme: Distinguishing right from wrong through divine revelation.

name: Ash-Shu’ara
mainTheme: The stories of prophets and the role of poets in society.

name: An-Naml
mainTheme: The story of Prophet Sulaiman and the lessons from ants.

name: Al-Qasas
mainTheme: The story of Prophet Musa (Moses) and lessons from history.

name: Al-Ankabut
mainTheme: The trials of believers and the metaphor of the spider’s web.

name: Ar-Rum
mainTheme: The defeat and future victory of the Romans, and signs in nature.

name: Luqman
mainTheme: The advice of Luqman to his son and moral teachings.

name: As-Sajda
mainTheme: The reality of resurrection and the submission to Allah.

name: Al-Ahzab
mainTheme: The Battle of the Trench and laws related to family and society.

name: Saba
mainTheme: The story of the people of Saba and reflections on wealth and gratitude.

name: Fatir
mainTheme: The creation of the universe and the attributes of Allah.

name: Ya-Sin
mainTheme: The heart of the Quran, emphasizing the message of resurrection and divine mercy.

name: As-Saffat
mainTheme: The ranks of angels and the stories of past prophets.

name: Sad
mainTheme: The trial of Prophet Dawud (David) and lessons in leadership.

name: Az-Zumar
mainTheme: The journey of human souls and the final judgment.

name: Ghafir
mainTheme: Divine mercy, forgiveness, and the story of a believer in Pharaoh’s court.

name: Fussilat
mainTheme: The clarity of the Quran and the consequences of rejecting it.

name: Ash-Shura
mainTheme: Consultation in governance and divine revelation as a source of guidance.

name: Az-Zukhruf
mainTheme: Wealth, materialism, and the rejection of divine guidance.

name: Ad-Dukhan
mainTheme: Warning of a day when the sky will be filled with smoke as a sign of the Hour.

name: Al-Jathiyah
mainTheme: The fate of nations that disbelieve and the divine guidance given to humanity.

name: Al-Ahqaf
mainTheme: The fate of the people of ‘Ad and the reality of the afterlife.

name: Muhammad
mainTheme: The rules of war and peace for the Muslim community and the fate of disbelievers.

name: Al-Fath
mainTheme: The peace treaty of Hudaybiyyah and the promise of future victories for the believers.

name: Al-Hujurat
mainTheme: The proper conduct of believers, particularly in matters of community and respect.

name: Qaf
mainTheme: The reality of resurrection and the afterlife, and reflection on creation.

name: Adh-Dhariyat
mainTheme: Signs of Allah in nature and the consequences of rejecting the truth.

name: At-Tur
mainTheme: The reward of the righteous in Paradise and a warning to the deniers of the truth.

name: An-Najm
mainTheme: The divine revelation and the ascension of Prophet Muhammad.

name: Al-Qamar
mainTheme: The splitting of the moon as a sign and the stories of past nations who denied the truth.

name: Ar-Rahman
mainTheme: The bounties of Allah and His mercy, especially the question, 'Which of the favors of your Lord will you deny?'

name: Al-Waqi’ah
mainTheme: The description of the Day of Judgment and the division of humanity into three groups.

name: Al-Hadid
mainTheme: The role of faith, charity, and the balance of worldly and spiritual life.

name: Al-Mujadila
mainTheme: The story of a woman who pleaded to the Prophet, and rulings on interpersonal disputes.

name: Al-Hashr
mainTheme: The exile of the Jewish tribes from Medina and reflections on Allah's names and attributes.

name: Al-Mumtahanah
englishName: She that is to be examined
mainTheme: Laws concerning the relations between Muslims and non-Muslims, especially during war.

name: As-Saff
mainTheme: The unity and discipline of believers and the importance of striving in the cause of Allah.

name: Al-Jumu’ah
mainTheme: The importance of the Friday prayer and the role of the Prophet in conveying divine guidance.

name: Al-Munafiqun
mainTheme: The characteristics of hypocrites and the consequences of their deceit.

name: At-Taghabun
mainTheme: The Day of Judgment and the reality of mutual disillusion among people.

name: At-Talaq
mainTheme: Rules and regulations regarding divorce and the treatment of women.

name: At-Tahrim
mainTheme: Warnings to the Prophet's wives and the importance of obedience to Allah.

name: Al-Mulk
mainTheme: The greatness of Allah's creation and the consequences of disbelief.

name: Al-Qalam
mainTheme: The significance of the Prophet's mission and the qualities of the righteous.

name: Al-Haaqqa
mainTheme: The reality of the Day of Judgment and the consequences for various nations.

name: Al-Ma'arij
mainTheme: The qualities of the believers and the realities of the Day of Judgment.

name: Nuh
mainTheme: The story of Prophet Noah and the consequences of disbelief.

name: Al-Jinn
mainTheme: The existence of jinn, their acknowledgment of the Quran, and the responsibility of mankind.

name: Al-Muzzammil
mainTheme: The call to prayer and patience in the face of adversity.

name: Al-Muddathir
mainTheme: The warning against disbelief and the responsibilities of the Prophet.

name: Al-Qiyamah
mainTheme: The certainty of resurrection and accountability on the Day of Judgment.

name: Al-Insan
mainTheme: The creation of man, his tests in life, and the rewards for the righteous.

name: Al-Mursalat
mainTheme: The signs of the Day of Judgment and the fates of disbelievers.

name: An-Naba
mainTheme: The announcement of the Day of Judgment and the evidence of God's creation.

name: An-Nazi'at
mainTheme: The resurrection and the consequences for those who reject the truth.

name: Abasa
mainTheme: The importance of compassion and the value of every individual.

name: At-Takwir
mainTheme: The signs of the Day of Judgment and the upheaval of natural order.

name: Al-Infitar
mainTheme: The Day of Judgment and the accountability of deeds.

name: Al-Mutaffifin
mainTheme: Condemnation of dishonest dealings and the fate of the wicked.

name: Al-Inshiqaq
mainTheme: The splitting of the heavens and the destiny of believers and disbelievers.

name: Al-Burooj
mainTheme: The greatness of Allah’s creation and the fate of the persecutors.

name: At-Tariq
mainTheme: The certainty of resurrection and the power of Allah.

name: Al-A'la
mainTheme: The glorification of Allah and the importance of remembrance.

name: Al-Ghashiyah
mainTheme: The Day of Judgment and the fate of the disbelievers.

name: Al-Fajr
mainTheme: The consequences of past nations and the importance of faith.

name: Al-Balad
mainTheme: The value of struggle and the path of righteousness.

name: Ash-Shams
mainTheme: The contrast between the soul's guidance and misguidance.

name: Al-Lail
mainTheme: The outcomes of righteousness and wickedness.

name: Ad-Duha
mainTheme: The reassurance to the Prophet and encouragement to the believers.

name: Al-Inshirah
mainTheme: The promise of ease after hardship.

name: At-Tin
mainTheme: The creation of man and his ultimate accountability.

name: Al-Alaq
mainTheme: The significance of knowledge and the first revelation to the Prophet.

name: Al-Qadr
mainTheme: The Night of Decree and its importance in the month of Ramadan.

name: Al-Bayyina
mainTheme: The clear proof of the Quran and the fate of disbelievers.

name: Az-Zalzalah
mainTheme: The events of the Day of Judgment and the accountability of deeds.

name: Al-Adiyat
mainTheme: The ingratitude of man and the greatness of Allah's gifts.

name: Al-Qari'a
mainTheme: The Day of Judgment and the weighing of deeds.

name: At-Takathur
mainTheme: The distractions of worldly life and the importance of accountability.

name: Al-Asr
mainTheme: The significance of time and the value of righteous deeds.

name: Al-Humazah
mainTheme: The consequences of slander and backbiting.

name: Al-Fil
mainTheme: The protection of the Kaaba and the story of the Army of the Elephant.

name: Quraish
mainTheme: The benefits and blessings bestowed upon the Quraish.

name: Al-Ma'un
mainTheme: The importance of prayer and charity in faith.

name: Al-Kawthar
mainTheme: The abundance granted to the Prophet and the fate of the enemies.

name: Al-Kafirun
mainTheme: The rejection of disbelief and the declaration of faith.

name: An-Nasr
mainTheme: The victory granted by Allah and the call to seek forgiveness.

name: Al-Masad
mainTheme: The condemnation of Abu Lahab and his wife.

name: Al-Ikhlas
mainTheme: The oneness of Allah and the concept of Tawhid.

name: Al-Falaq
mainTheme: Seeking refuge in Allah from external evils.

name: An-Nas
mainTheme: Seeking refuge in Allah from the evil of whisperers.
